Description: Create, modify, and manage customer subscriptions throughout their lifecycle including upgrades, downgrades, and cancellations.

Submodules.Create Subscription: Set up new subscriptions with plans, add-ons, and billing cycles.
Submodules.Subscription Changes: Handle upgrades, downgrades, and plan changes with proration options.
Submodules.Pause and Resume: Temporarily pause subscriptions and resume them when ready.
Submodules.Cancellation Handling: Process subscription cancellations with retention offers and feedback collection.
Submodules.Subscription Statuses: Understanding different subscription states: active, trial, cancelled, paused.

Description: Automate billing operations, generate invoices, and manage payment collection for subscriptions.

Submodules.Invoice Generation: Automatic and manual invoice creation with customizable templates.
Submodules.Proration: Calculate prorated charges for mid-cycle subscription changes.
Submodules.Credit Notes: Issue credit notes for refunds and billing adjustments.
Submodules.Metered Billing: Charge customers based on usage metrics and consumption.
Submodules.Invoice Customization: Customize invoice templates with branding, notes, and line items.

Description: Integrate with payment gateways to collect payments securely and manage payment methods.

Submodules.Payment Gateways: Connect with Stripe, Braintree, PayPal, Adyen, and other payment processors.
Submodules.Payment Methods: Support for credit cards, ACH, SEPA, direct debit, and digital wallets.
Submodules.Failed Payment Handling: Smart retry logic and dunning management for failed payments.
Submodules.PCI Compliance: Secure payment collection without storing sensitive card data.
Submodules.Multi-Currency: Accept payments in multiple currencies with automatic conversion.

Description: Automate revenue recognition to comply with ASC 606 and IFRS 15 accounting standards.

Submodules.Deferred Revenue: Track and recognize deferred revenue over subscription periods.
Submodules.Revenue Reports: Generate monthly and annual revenue recognition reports.
Submodules.Journal Entries: Automatic journal entry generation for accounting systems.
Submodules.Audit Trail: Complete audit trail of all revenue recognition activities.
Submodules.Accounting Integrations: Sync with QuickBooks, Xero, NetSuite, and other accounting software.

Description: Self-service portal where customers can manage their subscriptions, payments, and account details.

Submodules.Portal Configuration: Customize the customer portal with your branding and allowed actions.
Submodules.Self-Service Actions: Enable customers to update payment methods, change plans, and view invoices.
Submodules.Portal Access: Generate unique portal access links for customers.
Submodules.Mobile Optimization: Responsive portal design for mobile device access.
Submodules.Portal Analytics: Track customer portal usage and self-service adoption.

Description: Monitor key subscription metrics, MRR, churn, and generate business intelligence reports.

Submodules.MRR Tracking: Track Monthly Recurring Revenue with growth, churn, and expansion breakdown.
Submodules.Churn Analysis: Analyze customer churn rates and identify patterns.
Submodules.Cohort Analysis: Segment customers by signup date to analyze retention trends.
Submodules.Custom Reports: Build custom reports with filters and exportable data.
Submodules.Dashboard Widgets: Configurable dashboard with key metrics and visualizations.

Description: Integrate Chargebee with your applications using the REST API and receive real-time event notifications.

Submodules.REST API: Comprehensive API for managing subscriptions, customers, and invoices programmatically.
Submodules.Webhooks: Receive real-time notifications for subscription events like renewals and cancellations.
Submodules.API Authentication: Secure API access with API keys and authentication best practices.
Submodules.Rate Limits: Understanding API rate limits and optimization strategies.
Submodules.SDKs and Libraries: Official SDKs for Python, Ruby, PHP, Java, and other languages.
